description:
An alternative client for the BitwardenÂ® platform

Keyguard is an alternative client for the BitwardenÂ® platform, created to provide the best user experience possible.
Highlights:
- a beautiful rich and responsive Material You user interface;
- a powerful and fast search;
- a support for creating & using passkeys - a modern alternative to passwords.
- a watchtower that finds items with Pwned passwords, Vulnerable accounts, Reused passwords, Inactive two factor authentication, Inactive passkeys, Unsecure Websites as well as Duplicate, Incomplete and Expiring items, and other;
- multi-account support ðŸŒ  with secure login and two-factor authentication support;
- add items ðŸŒ  and sends ðŸŒ , modify ðŸŒ , and view your vault offline;
- export individual or organization items, including the attachments;
- beautiful Light/Dark theme;
- a generator with SSH keys, Email forwarders, Custom wordlists support, and many other features;
- a support for placeholders and URL overrides;
- and much more!
ðŸŒ  - on Android requires the Premium one-time or subscription license.
This update introduces a new feature allowing you to tap an application's URI to look it up in the Google Play, F-Droid, or Apple App stores, which now also fetches app icons. An issue on Android has been fixed where cancelling an autofill prompt could cause the service to stop working. For desktop users, the Windows and macOS apps now use the system's native certificate store for improved connectivity. This release also includes several minor performance and user interface enhancements.
All changes
- bfa2424d - chore: Bump app version name to 2.3.1
- cd320b9a - Merge pull request #1220 from AChep/localization_action
- d4fea9ba - Merge pull request #1231 from AChep/passkeys_action
- d827ecae - Merge pull request #1230 from AChep/justdeleteme_action

- 715f0b30 - [AUTO] Update localization library
- 48937723 - [AUTO] Update passkeys library

- 4f3e1557 - [AUTO] Update justdeleteme library
- 863fe011 - [AUTO] Update two-factor auth library
- de7af103 - [AUTO] Update Public suffix list
- 7be46eb9 - Merge pull request #1224 from AChep/dependabot/gradle/com.google.firebase-firebase-bom-34.8.0
- 7bee8309 - build(deps): Bump androidPlugin from 9.0.0-rc01 to 9.0.0
- f9e0802f - improvement(Windows,MacOS): Use system certificates store #1227
- 7b09e169 - improvement(UI,LargeType): Provide min cell width, so all the cells 0..100 have equal width #1221

- faff21e7 - improvement: Fix minor grammar and stylistical issues in the source translation
- 92ceb0b1 - fix: Make Google Play lookup clickable & adjust the layout a little
- a9bfa8ce - improvement: Use Google Play store metadata fetcher to get app icons where possible
- d1da9ad6 - fix: Add proguard rules for the Ksoup library

- 256d6f13 - refactor: Minor code cleanup
- 9379b0d1 - fix(Android,Autofill): Upon receiving Autofill cancellation signal only cancel a specific job, not stop the whole Autofill service

- da569b69 - improvement(DB): Create indexes for a minor performance improvement
